title: Spanish Holiday: Or, How I Transformed the Worst Vacation Ever into the Best Summer of My Life
description: Dear Bella and Bobby, Thank you SO MUCH for letting us stay at your villa. It's gorgeous, and we're having a fab time looking after it and enjoying the view of the mountains and the lovely olive grove. I figured out the bus to Ercos on the first day here -- it's as easy as you said! And Miguel's son Juan is helping us take care of everything, so you needn't worry at all! Love,Laura
author: Kate Cann
